name: Turtle Escape (BakenGamingStudios)
description:
A small platformer for the Brackey's Game Jam 2023 around the theme "The end is a new beginning."  Help your turtle ninja escape the frozen wasteland while battling baddies and performing death defying leaps over spike pits and saw blades!

DEVELOPER NOTE

Experience may be improved if played with a controller

Some of the sounds are a little loud at times.   Be wary.  Didn't have time to get them fully adjusted.  I apologize in advance.
